groups:block_about_show_founder_descript: Enable this option to show the group founder in block info of group.
groups:block_about_show_description: Enable this option to show block info of group when viewing a group.
groups_block_admin_limit_description:
Define the limit of how many admins can be displayed in Groups detail page.
0 means doesn't show this block.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_cat: Are you sure you want to delete this category image?
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_gro: Are you sure you want to delete this group permanently?
full_name_invited_you_to_the_group_title: {full_name} invited you to group "{title}". To check out this group, follow the link below: {link}
we_do_not_support_javascript_in_widgets_: We do not support javascript in widget's content. It will be automatically removed.
block_members_description:
Define the limit of how many members can be displayed in Groups detail page.
0 means doesn't show this block.
block_related_groups_description:
Define the limit of how many groups can be displayed in block Related Groups.
0 means doesn't show this block.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_use: Are you sure you want to delete this user from the group?
are_you_sure_you_want_to_remove_admin_ro: Are you sure you want to remove admin role from this user?
block_members_show_info: Show block members in group detail?
block_event_show_info: Show block event in group detail?
block_event_limit_description:
Define the limit of how many events can be displayed in block Group Events.
0 means doesn't show this block.
block_related_groups_show_info: Show block Related Groups in group detail?
